bioframe.name: Bioframe
bioframe.desc: Organic frame for growing Hive ships.

living_armor.name: Living Armor
living_armor.desc: Scale-like armor that can rapidly regenerate itself.

mining_organ.name: Mining Organ
mining_organ.desc: Functions as a mining laser and boosts harvesting of all tile resources. Useless for combat.

bioframe_vat.name: Bioframe Vat
bioframe_vat.desc:
Large pod for growing pieces of bioframe.
Converts 6 food, 4 water, 2 ore, 4 liquor to 2 jello and 3 bioframe per use.

jello_breeder.name: Jello Breeder
jello_breeder.desc:
Multiplies jello at great cost.
Converts 9 jello, 2 food, 4 water to 12 jello per use.

homeworld_return_device.name: Homeworld Return Device
homeworld_return_device.desc: Allows returning to the hive homeworld. Cooldown: 6 hours.
